com.glavsoft.drawing

Class SoftCursor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.glavsoft.drawing.SoftCursor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SoftCursorImpl

    public abstract class SoftCursor
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for operations with soft cursor positions, dimensions and hot point position.
